name: Global Conflagration
description: Global Conflagration is a Real Time Strategy game set in a near future fictional timeline, in which you defeat your opponent by taking control of the battlefield using the deadliest weaponry and units. Dominate the map by capturing key resource points, building up your base and destroying your opponent's units. Unlock new units, customize your color scheme and build up your army the way you want it by choosing from dozens of real life military units as well as our own fictional prototypes.
